cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with an allocation problem, which is a classic topic in game theory (cs.GT). It also involves algorithm design and analysis, which falls under the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The authors propose an algorithm that constructs an allocation, which involves optimization and decision-making, making it relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The problem also involves combinatorial optimization, which is a subfield of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). Finally, the paper discusses the running time of the algorithm, which is related to information theory (cs.IT).
